QuestData.Title: Further Concerns
QuestData.Description: If you are concerned that the rumors of murlocs are true, then do this -- travel to the eastern Elwynn bridge and speak with Guard Thomas. He has been stationed at the bridge for the past week and will know the state of the area.$B$BI have here a Stormwind charger that will take you to Guard Thomas. Let me know if you wish to make use of the horse.
QuestData.LogDescription: Marshal Dughan wants you to speak with Guard Thomas.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, murlocs have settled in and around the streams of eastern Elwynn. We don't know why they are here, but they are aggressive and at least semi-intelligent.
